body:
the sun came out unexpectedly and we went for a walk

realized that my keys had been lost for probably weeks and i hadn't realized because i didn't need them they were behind the box we use as a bench seat in the front room

deborah coughed in the exact rhythm of the stuttery synthesizer at the beginning of "[love in this club](https://open.spotify.com/album/12zaA5Lw0NCAm0edOLW3mC)"

neti pot after a long walk through thick pollen

i've started doing chat shifts at work and so far i find it more satisfying than i had thought i would (though i've been very lucky i know)

deborah is getting good at rolling joints

the [just javascript](https://justjavascript.com/) emails by dan abramov and maggie appleton, which are like these bright little mindfulness meditations and which i recommend even if you don't write code

the illustrated podcast quality of the first episode of _the midnight gospel_, which i enjoyed despite my general dislike of cartoons.

deborah describing miso as a NIMBY 

we drank less seltzer earlier in the week and so have more seltzer now, at the end of the week

bread and butter
